      This function tells the player to choose a card After a card is chosen, we will minus the card from his current hand of playing cards If the card chosen is invalid, show him his current hand of cards and tell him to choose a valid card If it is valid, minus the card from his current hand and return the chosen card.

      • computerPlaceBid

        public int computerPlaceBid​(Card trumpCard,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> possibleBids)
        This method contains all logic needed for a computer to place a bid
        Parameters:
        trumpCard - the trump card for this round
        possibleBids - the possible bids for this computer. Affected if the computer is the dealer
        Returns:
        an int representing the bid the computer selected based on the logic provided

      • promptPlayerCardInput

        public static int promptPlayerCardInput​(java.util.List<Card> hand,
                                        javax.swing.JLabel PlayerHand)
        This method prompts a player to choose a card from his hand
        Parameters:
        hand - his hand of cards
        PlayerHand - The JLabel to show the positioning of the prompt
        Returns:
        int representing the index of the cards chosen

      • playerChooseCard

        public Card playerChooseCard​(javax.swing.JLabel PlayerHand)
        This function tells the player to choose a card After a card is chosen, we will minus the card from his current hand of playing cards If the card chosen is invalid, show him his current hand of cards and tell him to choose a valid card If it is valid, minus the card from his current hand and return the chosen card.
        Parameters:
        PlayerHand - the jlabel to show the prompt option box for player input
        Returns:
        Card, the chosen card the player selected.

      • computerChooseCard

        public Card computerChooseCard​(Card trumpCard,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Card> pile,
                               Card leadCard)
        This function will help the computer choose the card. It makes decisions based on the current trump card, lead suit and the current pile of cards. To settle certain logic
        Parameters:
        trumpCard - trump card at round
        pile - current pile of cards on the table
        leadCard - lead card for trick
        Returns:
        Card, the chosen card the computer selected.
